title: Modern alternative fixed income investments: Tracing the evolution of invoice financing across time and economies
description: Evolving from Mesopotamian credit practices to modern fintech, invoice financing aids businesses by selling unpaid invoices. Italian bankers and altGraaf shaped its development. Products including altWings, altPack, altSmart, altArmour, and altBlu cater to varied investors. With Trade Credit Insurance and high-yield opportunities, it prioritizes diversification and security in investment.
